          <title>
            <string language="hu-HU">Andrea della Robbia: Szentháromság oltár, 15. század eleje, Székesegyház, Arezzo, 370x260 cm, majolika.</string>
            <string language="en-US">Andrea della Robbia: Trinity Altar, Early 15th Century, Cathedral Arezzo, 370x260 cm, maiolica.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Andrea della Robbia: Dreiheit-Altar, früh 
15. Jahrhundert, Kathedrale Arezzo, 370x260 Zentimeter, maiolica.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Della Robbia d'Andrea : Autel de trinité, 
tôt 15ème siècle, cathédrale Arezzo, 370x260 centimètre, 
maiolica.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Della Robbia de Andrea: Altar do trinity, 
cedo 1ö século, catedral Arezzo, 370x260 cm, maiolica.</string>

presto quindicesimo secolo, cattedrale Arezzo, 370x260 centimetro, 
maiolica.</string>

15$ος νωρίς αιώνας, καθεδρικός ναός Αρέζο, 370x260 εκατ., 
maiolica.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Della Robbia de Andrea: Altar de la trinidad,
temprano décimo quinto siglo, catedral Arezzo, 370x260 centímetro, 
maiolica.</string>
